properties.MonoWasmManagedOutputDir: Directory into which managed assemblies will be placed. Defaults to $(OutputDir)managed\.
properties.MonoWasmIntermediateDir: Directory into which intermediate WebAssembly artifacts will be placed. Defaults to $(IntermediateOutputDir)monowasm\.

MonoWasmLinkMode.description: Which kinds of assemblies should be linked, i.e. stripped of unused code

MonoWasmLinkSkip.description: List of names of assemblies that should not be linked
